item.description: Everyone had such a good time last month that we'll do it again. Has everyone looked at all the photos taken there in January? This time I hope those of you who missed it then will be able to enjoy it. What a nice change from dealing with snow, right? Unfortunately, I won't be able to attend that day myself, but don't worry, I know that won't spoil the fun! Remember, North Shore Dog charges $5.00/dog who attends.

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: Run around and play indoors at North Shore Dog again!
